title: Durin's Secret (1R71)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot Gandalf, a Dwarf, and an Elf to make the move limit for this turn +1.
Lore:	”'They are wrought of ithildin that mirrors only starlight and moonlight, and sleeps until it is touched by one who speaks words now long forgotten in Middle-earth.'”
Rarity:	R
